title: A Chic Premiere and the Women of Netflix's 'Sex/Life'
description:
In the very first episode of "Chic Shit Only," Lauren welcomes creator Stacy Rukeyser and star Sarah Shahi to talk about the double standards facing women in media with regards to sexuality. They talk about all things "Sex/Life", including THAT scene and what season 2 might bring. Plus, Lauren brings you up to speed with her life, what it's like to travel during a pandemic, and she begins the ever-growing list of things that are chic and things that are shit.
Watch the podcast on YouTube: https://bit.ly/ChicShitOnlyYT
Watch the podcast on IG: https://bit.ly/ChicShitOnlyIG
Don’t forget to subscribe to the podcast for free wherever you're listening or by using this link: https://bit.ly/ChicShitOnlyPodcast
